name: PANDO Engines
description:
PANDO Engines is a 2.5D online co-op real-time party game where players work together creating their own custom dieselpunk engine. Enter post-apocalyptic British Columbia Canada frozen in the midst of a nuclear winter. 100 years following the blasts, of 2178, PANDO’s (Population Assembly Nucleotide Development Organization) cloning facility opens, releasing the first wave of untouched humans since the nuclear war. Tasked by your creators with bringing order to the world, work together with your team navigating the hostile terrain in your mobile fortress. Whether the different pseudo-random threats by manning turrets, putting out fires, shoveling coal, repairing segments, and performing daily maintenance. How long will you survive?

Main Features
  • Online Co-OP
  • Modular Ship Building
  • Chaotic Task Management
  • Random Events
